extendedInfo.description: *** NEW *** WEATHER RADARS*** NEW *** WEATHER MAPS ZOOM*** NEW *** GEOGRAPHICAL MAP OF LOCATIONS*** NEW *** ADD ANY LOCATION ON EARTH FROM MAP, CUSTOM LOCATION NAME*** NEW WEATHER ALERTS ****** NEW HOURLY FORECASTS AND DETAILED CHARTS incl CLOUDINESS ***For more details, check our new website:http://www.android-weather.comGet the latest current conditions, forecasts, weather charts, forecast maps, webcams and more with largest network of professional weather stations all over the world in a great looking style!FEATURES, or what makes this a FULL PACKAGE:========CORE FUNCTIONALITY:- Live and detailed local weather conditions and forecasts- HOURLY weather data including details as Cloudiness, Humidity, Feels like, Air pressure, Wind, % chance of rain and precipitation- Millions! of locations around the world- Exact dynamic and automated current location search with 'My Location' functionality- 7 desktop weather widgets with (Flip Clock I & II 4x2, Forecast 4x2, Large 4x2, Forecast 4x1, Clock 4x1, Mini 1x1)- Notification bar icon witch temperature and weather details- Weather alerts in USA- Up to 10 active locations- Geographical map of locationsCOOL FEATURES:- Live Webcams for every location to see the real weather conditions (largest webcams network)- Forecast Charts for Temperature, Precipitation, Humidity, Cloudiness- Weather Forecast Maps for precipitation, clouds, temperatures and wind (also in HD available)**- Choose weather data provider which fits your location best (WeatherBug, OpenWeatherMap or YR.NO)- Dual Clock â select from System, GMT or Location time- Moon phase, Sunrise, Sunset- App Hints screensMAKE YOUR APPLICATION UNIQUE:- THEMES - customize your app by one click or create your own !- Fully graphical customizable (font types, backgrounds, colors, text outline â¦)- Fully customizable app settings (units, startup, updates, notification barâ¦)OTHER USEFUL ATTRIBUTES:- One of the best battery consumption application on the Market- Quick access to your prefered clock and calendar application (configurable)- Option to display locations time on widget- Cached weather data for offline viewing- Easy use and high-impact visual eye candy views- Broad OS compatibility: Android 1.6+, QVGA, WQVGA400/432, HVGA, WVGA800/854And there is more to come, we develop and improve our app continuously.If you like Weather Services-RATE US. Thank you and enjoy!IMPORTANT=========If you are experiencing any issues, please make sure your data connectivity is up & running. Vast majority of our low ratings are because of local issues, please contact us and let us help you first:Contact: support@android-weather.comRelase notes:=============If you have any ideas, how to improve our application, please let us know.v2.3.2Added: Widgets with landscape mode compatibilityFixed: Locations screen - add location directly from the mapFixed: WeatherBug data provider alerts..other small fixes and improvements from your (support channels) requestsv2.3.1Fixed: F/C for some US locations with WeatherBug provider after refresh to v2.3Added: More locations on google map (add location direcyle clicking on the map)v2.3Added: New FlipClock v2 widget !Fixed: Google maps - select location from mapFixed: Weather radars for android version 2.3.3 and olderFixed: Problem with removing the first locationFixed: Minimum and maximum temperatures for current day with YR.no data provider fixedOther small fixes for some types of devices...v2.2Added: New weather data provider with hourly forecast (now total of 3 diffrent providers available)Added: New locations list (summary) window design with extended menuAdded: Search for location directly from the google mapAdded: New improved tutorial (hint) screensFixed: Forecast maps... and more (v2.1.5-v1.0)** we provide Forecast Maps, which are not Live Radars, as some may exchange this expression. Live Radars are being developed and will come soon

reviews.comment: Please fix this.
reviews.author: Frank Welch

reviews.comment: Disappointed.  I bought this app for the radar and that\'s the only part that doesn\'t work. Out the money. Great LOOKING app. but the radar was the purpose for me.
reviews.author: Lori Stanley

reviews.title: Works fine on my HTC One X+ now ... Thanks !
reviews.comment: I was using V2.1.4 Pro but I have uninstalled it now. Will not store locations, and does not know not my location either, useless really, as I can\'t get ANY weather displayed at all, it just does NOTHING. Other weather programs find my location OK  Wish I hadn\'t got the paid for Pro version before trying it out now but thought I would buy it straight away as I HATE adverts. I know there were problems like this in earlier versions, but I thought they would have been solved by now as they were 1-4 months ago but it seems developer hasn\'t solved them. And yes, I have mailed then for support but I don\'t hold out much hope as previous users with this problem haven\'t updated their opinions by saying it works now.  The annoying thing really is that it is one of the most expensive programs on here at \302\2432.49 and it looks like I will just have to write the money off... not good.   UPDATE ON VERSION 2.1.5pro The app works PEFECTLY now ... so goes from 1 STAR to 5 Stars !!! Brilliant ... Many thanks !
reviews.author: Steve Denney

reviews.title: Coolest features only available with broken provider
reviews.comment: Misleading product, watch your wallet. Got the app specifically to get hourly charted precipitation forecasts, but this is only available with 1 of the 3 weather data providers and unfortunately this provider (YR) can\'t get New York City data correct. So if you\'re one of the 10 million people who live in NYC, save your money as there are no intraday graphs for ANY weather information.
reviews.author: Tucker Sferro

reviews.title: Trouble
reviews.comment: Loaded on phone. Would find location automatically or manually. Please fix.
